name: Standard Push-Up
description: Start in a high plank position. Lower your chest toward the floor by bending elbows, keeping body rigid. Push back up smoothly without locking elbows aggressively.

name: Diamond Push-Up
description: Place hands close together so index fingers and thumbs touch. Lower chest to hands and push up, keeping elbows tucked close to sides.

name: Wide Grip Push-Up
description: Place hands wider than shoulder-width. Lower body slowly and push up, focusing on the stretch in the chest.

name: Pike Push-Up
description: From downward dog position (hips high), bend elbows to lower head toward the floor. Push back up towards hips. Keep motion controlled to protect head.

name: Hindu Push-Up (Slow)
description: Swoop down from downward dog, chest skimming the floor, into cobra pose. Push back to downward dog slowly. Do not slam hips.

name: Dive Bomber Push-Up
description: Swoop from downward dog to cobra, then reverse the exact motion backwards to the start. Requires significant control.

name: Archer Push-Up
description: Wide hands. Lower body to one side, straightening the other arm. Push up and switch. Keep movements fluid and slow.

name: Spiderman Push-Up
description: As you lower, bring one knee to the elbow on the same side without touching the foot to the ground. Push up and return leg.

name: T-Rotation Push-Up
description: Push up, then rotate torso to side plank, reaching arm up. Return hand to floor gently. Alternate sides.

name: Staggered Push-Up
description: One hand standard, one hand lower near ribs. Push up, focusing on uneven load distribution. Switch hands after set.

name: Slow Negative Push-Up
description: Lower your body from high plank to floor taking 5-10 full seconds. Reset to knees to get back up. Focus on tension.

name: Knuckle Push-Up
description: Perform push-up on knuckles to protect wrists or increase range of motion. Place knuckles gently on floor.

name: Fingertip Push-Up
description: Perform push-up on fingertips. Requires high hand strength. Do not attempt if fingers are weak.

name: Pseudo Planche Push-Up
description: Hands near waist, fingers pointing back/out. Lean shoulders far forward over wrists. Push up while maintaining forward lean.

name: Typewriter Push-Up
description: Start in wide push-up at the bottom. Slide body horizontally left to right, keeping chest just off the floor.

name: Single-Arm Push-Up (Assisted)
description: One hand on floor, one behind back. Feet wide. Lower and push up. Use a wall for balance assist if needed.

name: Knee Push-Up
description: Standard push-up motion with knees on the ground. Keep straight line from head to knees.

name: Cobra Push-Up
description: Lie prone, hands under shoulders. Push upper body up keeping hips on floor. Focus on squeezing triceps at top.

name: Floor Tricep Dips
description: Sit, hands behind you, knees bent. Lift hips slightly. Bend elbows to lower hips (don't sit), straighten arms to lift.

name: Isometric Push-Up Hold
description: Lower into a push-up until chest is 2 inches from floor. Hold this position statically for time.

name: Air Squat
description: Feet shoulder-width. Lower hips back and down. Stand up squeezing glutes. Keep feet flat and quiet.

name: Sumo Squat
description: Wide stance, toes out. Lower hips straight down. Targets inner thighs more than standard squat.

name: Prisoner Squat
description: Squat with hands interlaced behind head. Keeps chest up and engages upper back posture.

name: Pulse Squat
description: Lower to bottom of squat. Pulse up and down 3 inches continuously without standing up. Builds tension.

name: Pistol Squat
description: Single-leg squat. Extend one leg forward, lower all the way down on standing leg. Push back up. Very hard.

name: Shrimp Squat
description: Stand on one leg, hold other foot behind you. Lower bent knee to touch floor gently. Stand back up.

name: Forward Lunge
description: Step forward, lower hips until knees are 90 degrees. Push back to start gently.

name: Reverse Lunge
description: Step back, lower hips. Return to standing. Easier on knees than forward lunge.

name: Side Lunge
description: Step wide to side, bend that knee, keep other leg straight. Push back to center.

name: Curtsy Lunge
description: Step leg back and across behind other leg. Lower hips. Return to center.

name: Walking Lunge
description: Lunge forward, then step back foot forward into next lunge. Move smoothly and quietly across room.

name: Cossack Squat
description: Very wide stance. Squat deep on one side, rotating opposite foot onto heel. Keep heel down on squatting leg.

name: Split Squat
description: Static lunge position. Lower knee to floor and stand up without moving feet placement.

name: Duck Walk
description: Deep squat. Walk forward staying as low as possible. rolling from heel to toe quietly.

name: Calf Raise
description: Stand tall. Press into toes to lift heels high. Lower slowly. Do not bounce.

name: Single-Leg Calf Raise
description: Stand on one leg. Lift heel high. Use wall fingertip support if balance fails, or do free-standing.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift hips until body is straight line. Squeeze glutes hard at top.

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
description: One foot on floor, one leg in air. Lift hips using grounded leg. Keep hips level.

name: Frog Pump
description: Soles of feet together, knees out. Lift hips rapidly but controlled. High rep burnout.

name: Donkey Kick
description: All fours. Kick one foot up to ceiling keeping knee bent. Squeeze glute at top.

name: Fire Hydrant
description: All fours. Lift bent leg out to side. Keep torso still, do not rotate spine.

name: Clamshell
description: Side-lying, knees bent. Open top knee while keeping feet touching. Great for hip health.

name: Side Leg Raise
description: Lie on side. Lift top straight leg up. Lower slowly. Avoid using momentum.

name: Inner Thigh Lift
description: Lie on side, cross top leg over. Lift bottom straight leg up towards ceiling.

name: Sissy Squat (Knees Only)
description: Kneeling. Lean back keeping straight line from knees to head. Use quads to pull back up.

name: Kang Squat
description: Good morning (hinge) into deep squat, then back to good morning, then stand.

name: Horse Stance (Static Squat)
description: Wide stance squat. Hold the bottom position isometrically. Keep chest up.

name: Single Leg Balance
description: Stand on one leg. Close eyes to increase difficulty significantly.

name: Standard Plank
description: Forearms on floor. Body straight. Squeeze glutes and abs. Don't let hips sag.

name: High Plank
description: Top of push-up position. Arms straight. Easier on core than forearm plank, harder on shoulders.

name: Side Plank
description: Prop on one forearm, body sideways straight line. Hold. Do not collapse shoulder.

name: Up-Down Plank
description: High plank to forearm plank and back. Place hands gently to avoid thumping sounds.

name: Shoulder Tap Plank
description: High plank. Tap opposite shoulder with hand. Prevent hips from rocking side to side.

name: Slow Mountain Climber
description: High plank. Bring knee to chest slowly and squeeze abs. Switch legs with control. No running.

name: Cross-Body Mountain Climber
description: High plank. Bring knee slowly to opposite elbow. Squeeze obliques.

name: Spiderman Plank Crunch
description: Plank. Bring knee to same-side elbow externally. Squeeze side body.

name: Reverse Plank
description: Face up, hands behind you. Lift hips to straight line. Opens shoulders and chest.

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: Lie back. Lift legs and shoulders inches off floor. Press lower back into ground hard.

name: V-Up
description: Lie back. Simultaneously lift legs and torso to touch toes. Control the descent.

name: Tuck Up
description: Like V-Up but bring knees to chest. Easier lever length than V-Up.

name: Bicycle Crunch
description: Slow controlled twisting crunch connecting opposite elbow to knee.

name: Standard Crunch
description: Small movement lifting shoulder blades off floor. Focus on contracting abs, not pulling neck.

name: Reverse Crunch
description: Lift hips off floor bringing knees to chest. Controls lower abs.

name: Leg Raise
description: Lie back. Lift straight legs to 90 degrees and lower slowly. Don't let back arch.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: Legs straight, hovering off floor. Small controlled up/down kicks. Keep back pressed down.

name: Scissor Kicks
description: Legs hovering. Cross one over other, open, cross other. Keep legs straight.

name: Russian Twist
description: Seated, leaning back. Rotate torso side to side. Keep feet on floor for easier, up for harder.

name: Heel Touch
description: Lie back, knees bent. Side crunch to touch heel with hand. Alternate.

name: Dead Bug
description: Back flat on floor. Extend opposite arm and leg slowly while exhaling. Inhale to return.

name: Bird Dog
description: All fours. Extend opposite arm and leg straight. Hold. Maintain flat back.

name: Superman
description: Lie on stomach. Lift arms and legs off floor. Hold. Strengthens posterior chain.

name: Swimmer
description: Prone position. Flutter arms and legs like swimming. Keep limbs off floor.

name: Windshield Wiper (Floor)
description: Lie back, legs up. Lower legs side to side slowly. Use arms for support.

name: Seated Knee Tuck
description: Sit balancing on glutes. Extend legs and torso away, then crunch together.

name: Star Plank
description: High plank, walk hands and feet out wide into X shape. Hold. Very demanding.

name: Plank Hip Dip
description: Forearm plank. Rotate hips to touch floor lightly on each side.

name: L-Sit (Tuck)
description: Seated. Hands on floor. Push down to lift hips and tucked legs off floor.

name: Boat Pose
description: Yoga static hold. Balance on sit bones, body in V shape, arms reaching forward.

name: Plank Reach
description: Plank. Reach one arm forward without shifting weight. Alternate.

name: Body Saw
description: Forearm plank. Rock body forward and backward using ankles. Increases leverage on abs.

name: Bear Crawl Hold
description: All fours. Lift knees 1 inch off floor. Hold static. Back flat.

name: Side Plank Dip
description: Side plank. Lower hips to floor and raise back up high.

name: Single Leg Deadlift (Bodyweight)
description: Stand on one leg. Hinge hip back, torso forward. Leg extends back. Return.

name: Floor Angel
description: Lie back. Arms 90 degrees. Slide arms overhead keeping wrists/elbows on floor.

name: Prone W Extension
description: Lie prone. Arms in W shape. Lift chest and arms, squeezing shoulder blades.

name: Tabletop Hold
description: Reverse tabletop. Hands behind, feet flat. Hips high. Hold.

name: Iron Cross Plank
description: Plank with arms extended very wide to sides in T shape. Extremely hard on core/shoulders.

name: Inchworm
description: Bend to touch toes. Walk hands out to plank. Walk hands back. No jumping.

name: Bear Crawl (Slow)
description: Crawl forward opposite hand/foot. Knees close to ground. Silent movement.

name: Crab Walk
description: Reverse table top. Walk hands and feet. Keeps triceps and glutes engaged.

name: Hamstring Walkout
description: Top of glute bridge. Walk feet out away from body on heels, then walk back in.

name: Shin Box Extension
description: Sit 90/90 legs. Thrust hips up to kneeling. Lower slowly. Mobility and strength.

name: Plank with Leg Lift
description: Standard plank. Lift one leg straight up without arching back. Hold or pulse.

name: Side Plank Leg Lift
description: Side plank. Lift top leg up. Requires immense stability.

name: Hollow Rock
description: Hold hollow body shape. Gently rock forward and back. Maintain curved spine.

name: Prone Heel Claps
description: Lie on stomach, legs straight and lifted. Tap heels together rapidly.

name: Kneeling Lean Back
description: Kneel tall. Keep straight line from knees to head. Lean back as far as possible using quads.

name: Butterfly Sit-Up
description: Soles of feet together. Sit up all the way to touch toes. Lower slowly.

name: Marching Glute Bridge
description: Hold glute bridge. Lift one knee to chest, then switch. Do not let hips drop.

name: Reverse Snow Angel
description: Lie prone. Arms at sides. Lift arms and sweep overhead and back without touching floor.

name: Quadruped Limb Lift
description: All fours, knees hovering (Bear). Lift one arm or one leg without tipping.

name: Scorpion Stretch/Twist
description: Prone. Arms wide. Bring one foot across back to touch opposite hand. Dynamic mobility.

name: Cat-Cow
description: All fours. Arch back up (cat), then sink spine down (cow). Spine health.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
description: Lunge, reach elbow to instep, rotate arm to ceiling. Slow flow.

name: Crab Reach
description: Crab position. Drive hips up and reach one arm over head towards floor.

name: Prone Sky Diver
description: Lie on stomach. Lift everything up, arms wide, knees wide. Hold.

name: Wall-less Wall Sit (Horse Stance)
description: Just a static squat hold. Same as Horse Stance, included for naming clarity.

name: Side Lying Leg Circle
description: Lie on side. Draw circles with top leg. Clockwise and counter-clockwise.
